entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 08:49 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:01 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 07:01 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
